TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HttpClientHandler extends System.Net.Http.HttpMessageHandler

summary.span: 使用的默认消息处理程序。

span.span: The default message handler used by .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类和从它派生的类，开发人员可以配置各种选项范围从代理到身份验证。The class and classes derived from it enable developers to configure a variety of options ranging from proxies to authentication. ### 在.NET 核心 HttpClientHandlerHttpClientHandler in .NET Core 从.NET 核心 2.1类而不是`HttpClientHandler`提供更高级别的 HTTP 网络 Api 使用的实现。Starting with .NET Core 2.1, the class instead of `HttpClientHandler` provides the implementation used by higher-level HTTP networking APIs. 你可以配置应用程序使用`HttpClientHandler`改为通过调用方法，如下所示：You can configure your application to use `HttpClientHandler` instead by calling the method as follows: ```csharp AppContext.SetSwitch("System.Net.Http.useSocketsHttpHandler", false); ``` ```vb AppContext.SetSwitch("System.Net.Http.useSocketsHttpHandler", False) ``` ## Examples [!code-csharp[System.Net.Http.HttpClientHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/system.net.http.httpclienthandler/cs/source.cs#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AllowAutoRedirect { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.AllowAutoRedirect : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示处理程序是否应跟随重定向响应。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the handler should follow redirection responses.

value.span: 如果处理程序应跟随重定向响应，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the if the handler should follow redirection responses; otherwise .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置到`true`如果你想要自动遵循到新位置的资源的 HTTP 重定向标头的处理程序。Set to `true` if you want the handler to automatically follow HTTP redirection headers to the new location of the resource. 通过设置最大数量的重定向按照属性。The maximum number of redirections to follow is set by the property. 如果设置为`false`，所有来自 HTTP 响应包含 HTTP 状态代码 300 到 399 返回到应用程序。If is set to `false`, all HTTP responses with an HTTP status code from 300 to 399 are returned to the application. 在自动重定向清除的 Authorization 标头，且该处理程序会自动尝试对重定向的位置重新进行身份验证。The Authorization header is cleared on auto-redirects and the handler automatically tries to re-authenticate to the redirected location. 在实践中，这意味着应用程序无法将自定义身份验证信息打包在 Authorization 标头，如果它是可能会遇到重定向。In practice, this means that an application can't put custom authentication information into the Authorization header if it is possible to encounter redirection. 相反，应用程序必须实现并注册一个自定义身份验证模块。Instead, the application must implement and register a custom authentication module. > [!NOTE] > 与设置为`true`，.NET Framework 将遵循重定向，即使从 HTTPS URI 重定向到的 HTTP URI。With set to `true`, the .NET Framework will follow redirections even when being redirected to an HTTP URI from an HTTPS URI. .NET 核心版本 1.0、 1.1 和 2.0 将不遵循重定向从 HTTPS 到 HTTP 即使设置为`true`。.NET Core versions 1.0, 1.1 and 2.0 will not follow a redirection from HTTPS to HTTP even if is set to `true`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET framework 4.x`System.Net.Http`二进制在全局程序集缓存 (GAC) 中，默认值是。For the .NET Framework 4.x `System.Net.Http` binary in the Global Assembly Cache (GAC), the default value is . 当[ `System.Net.Http` NuGet 包](https://www.nuget.org/packages/System.Net.Http/)使用到 v4.3.2 v4.1.0，则默认为和。When the [`System.Net.Http` NuGet package](https://www.nuget.org/packages/System.Net.Http/) v4.1.0 to v4.3.2 is used, the default is and . NuGet 包 v4.3.2 的默认值后使用。After NuGet package v4.3.2, the default value of is used.

summary.span: 获取或设置用于通过处理程序存储服务器 Cookie 的 Cookie 容器。

span.span: The cookie container used to store server cookies by the handler.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性提供的实例类，其中包含与此处理程序关联的 cookie。The property provides an instance of the class that contains the cookies associated with this handler. 如果属性是`true`、属性表示用来存储服务器 cookie 的 cookie 容器。If the property is `true`, the property represents the cookie container used to store the server cookies. 用户可以在发送请求使用此属性前设置自定义 cookie。The user can set custom cookies before sending requests using this property. 如果属性为 false，并且用户将添加到 cookie ，cookie 会被忽略且不会发送到服务器。If the property is false and the user adds cookies to , cookies are ignored and not sent to the server. 设置到`null`将引发异常。Setting the to `null` will throw an exception.

MemberSignature.Value: .property class System.Func`5<class System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage, class System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2, class System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Chain, valuetype System.Net.Security.SslPolicyErrors, bool> DangerousAcceptAnyServerCertificateValidator
Public Shared ReadOnly Property DangerousAcceptAnyServerCertificateValidator As Func(Of HttpRequestMessage, X509Certificate2, X509Chain, SslPolicyErrors, Boolean)

public: static property Func<System::Net::Http::HttpRequestMessage ^, System::Security::Cryptography::X509Certificates::X509Certificate2 ^, System::Security::Cryptography::X509Certificates::X509Chain ^, System::Net::Security::SslPolicyErrors, bool> ^ DangerousAcceptAnyServerCertificateValidator { Func<System::Net::Http::HttpRequestMessage ^, System::Security::Cryptography::X509Certificates::X509Certificate2 ^, System::Security::Cryptography::X509Certificates::X509Chain ^, System::Net::Security::SslPolicyErrors, bool> ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取始终返回 的缓存委托。

span.span: Gets a cached delegate that always returns .

value.span: 始终返回 的缓存委托。

span.span: A cached delegate that always returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 尤其是在测试方案中，一个常见模式使用连接到使用不应验证，如自签名证书的证书的服务器。Particularly in test scenarios, a common pattern use to connect to a server with a certificate that shouldn't be validated, such as a self-signed certificate. 你通常对执行此操作通过设置属性始终返回委托`True`; 这表明证书已通过验证。You commonly do this with by setting the property to a delegate that always returns `True`; this indicates that the certificate has passed validation. 但是，并非所有实现都支持此回调中并且某些引发。However, not all implementations support this callback, and some throw . 属性解决了此限制。The property addresses this limitation. 通过返回的委托属性可以分配给属性，如下面的示例未：The delegate returned by the property can be assigned to the property, as the following example does: ```cs handler.ServerCertificateCustomValidationCallback = httpClientHandler.DangerousAcceptAnyServerCertificateValidator; ``` 这使实现表示开发人员的意图的已知的对象引用标识。This gives implementations a known object reference identity that expresses the developer's intention. 如果该对象存储在属性是引用等于，运行时能够完全禁用验证，否则将引发的平台上。If the object stored in the property is reference equals to , the runtime is able to entirely disable validation on a platform that would otherwise throw a . 额外的好处，开发人员可以使用此属性使你更轻松工具来标记禁用证书验证，便于开发人员能够避免传送不安全应用程序的危险。As a side benefit, developers can use this property to make it easier for tools to flag the danger of disabling certificate validation, which makes it easier for developers to avoid shipping insecure applications.

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally disposes of the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法称为由公共`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当 `disposing` 参数为 `true` 时，此方法释放该 引用的、由任何托管对象持有的全部资源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

summary.span: 请注意，该限制针对每个服务器终结点，例如，值为 256 表示允许 256 个到 http://www.adatum.com/ 的并发连接，以及另外 256 个到 http://www.adventure-works.com/ 的并发连接。

span.span: Note that the limit is per server endpoint, so for example a value of 256 would permit 256 concurrent connections to http://www.adatum.com/ and another 256 to http://www.adventure-works.com/.

value.span: 最大允许的 （每个服务器终结点） 的并发连接数对象。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序可以设置属性设置为较低的值将请求缓冲区的大小限制。An app can set the property to a lower value to limit the size of the request buffer. 如果请求内容的大小大于属性，将引发异常。If the size of the request content is greater than the property, an exception is thrown.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示处理程序是否随请求发送授权标头。

value.span: 表示处理程序在发生身份验证之后随请求一起发送 HTTP 授权标头；否则为 。

span.span: for the handler to send an HTTP Authorization header with requests after authentication has taken place; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对特定的客户端请求后成功通过身份验证，如果属性是`true`和提供凭据，根据凭据列表的匹配项中提供属性。After a client request to a specific is successfully authenticated, if the property is `true` and credentials are supplied, matches against the credential list supplied in the property. 授权标头与每个请求发送到任何匹配特定直到最后一个正斜杠。The Authorization header is sent with each request to any that matches the specific up to the last forward slash. 如果客户端请求到特定是不成功通过身份验证，请求使用标准身份验证过程。If the client request to a specific is not successfully authenticated, the request uses standard authentication procedures. 第一个请求，除了属性指示是否将发送到的后续请求的身份验证信息匹配特定而无需等待将在最后一个正斜杠由服务器面临的挑战。With the exception of the first request, the property indicates whether to send authentication information with subsequent requests to a that matches the specific up to the last forward slash without waiting to be challenged by the server.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Net::IWebProxy ^ Proxy { System::Net::IWebProxy ^ get(); void set(System::Net::IWebProxy ^ value); };
member this.Proxy : System.Net.IWebProxy with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置处理程序使用的代理信息。

span.span: Gets or sets proxy information used by the handler.

value.span: 处理程序使用的代理信息。

span.span: The proxy information used by the handler.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性标识要用来处理对 Internet 资源的请求对象。The property identifies the object to use to process requests to Internet resources. 若要指定应使用无代理，设置属性返回的代理实例方法。To specify that no proxy should be used, set the property to the proxy instance returned by the method. 使用默认代理，可以指定本地计算机或应用程序配置文件。The local computer or application config file may specify that a default proxy be used. 如果指定属性，然后从的代理设置属性覆盖本地计算机或应用程序配置文件和处理程序将使用指定的代理设置。If the property is specified, then the proxy settings from the property override the local computer or application config file and the handler will use the proxy settings specified. 如果在配置文件中不指定任何代理和属性为未指定，该处理程序使用从 Internet 资源管理器继承在本地计算机上的代理设置。If no proxy is specified in a config file and the property is unspecified, the handler uses the proxy settings inherited from Internet Explorer on the local computer. 如果没有在 Internet Explorer 代理设置，请直接向服务器发送请求。If there are no proxy settings in Internet Explorer, the request is sent directly to the server. 类解析包含通配符字符的代理跳过列表继承从 Internet 资源管理器相同跳过列表分析直接通过 Internet Explorer。The class parses a proxy bypass list with wildcard characters inherited from Internet Explorer the same as the bypass list is parsed directly by Internet Explorer. 例如，类将正则表达式的分析的"nt *"Internet Explorer 中的跳过列表"nt。\*"。For example, the class will parse a bypass list of "nt*" from Internet Explorer as a regular expression of "nt.\*". 因此的 URL" http://nt.com"将跳过代理使用类并使用 Internet Explorer。So a URL of " http://nt.com" would bypass the proxy using the class and using Internet Explorer. 类支持本地代理绕过。The class supports local proxy bypass. 类会将目标是本地如果满足以下任何条件视为：The class considers a destination to be local if any of the following conditions are met: 1. 目标包含一个简单的名称 （在 URL 中没有句点）。The destination contains a flat name (no dots in the URL). 2. 目标包含环回地址 (或) 或目标包含分配给本地计算机。The destination contains a loopback address ( or ) or the destination contains an assigned to the local computer. 3. 目标的域后缀匹配本地计算机的域后缀 ()。The domain suffix of the destination matches the local computer's domain suffix ().

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Security::Authentication::SslProtocols SslProtocols { System::Security::Authentication::SslProtocols get(); void set(System::Security::Authentication::SslProtocols value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 HttpClientHandler 对象管理的 对象所用的 TLS/SSL 协议。

span.span: Gets or sets the TLS/SSL protocol used by the objects managed by the HttpClientHandler object.

value.span: 枚举中定义的值之一。

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示处理程序是否使用 属性来存储服务器 Cookie 并在发送请求时使用这些 Cookie。

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值控制处理程序是否随请求一起发送默认凭据。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that controls whether default credentials are sent with requests by the handler.

value.span: 如果使用默认凭据，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the default credentials are used; otherwise .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将此属性设置为`true`时发出的请求对象，如果请求服务器进行身份验证应使用当前登录用户的凭据。Set this property to `true` when requests made by the object should, if requested by the server, be authenticated using the credentials of the currently logged on user. 对于客户端应用程序，这是在大多数情况下所需的行为。For client applications, this is the desired behavior in most scenarios. 对于中间层应用程序，例如 ASP.NET 应用程序，而不是使用此属性，通常会设置到客户端的名义发出的请求的凭据的属性。For middle-tier applications, such as ASP.NET applications, instead of using this property, you would typically set the property to the credentials of the client on whose behalf the request is made.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值表示处理程序是否对请求使用代理。

value.span: 默认值为 。
